name: Age of Conquest III
description:
Age of Conquest is a medieval risk-like turn-based strategy game where you take the reins of a budding empire and struggle against fellow empires for control of the world. In one game, up to 30+ players vie for supremacy, but only one can be victorious. Every game you win pushes up your score, until you don't just dominate the world, but also your fellow players. Then all will be in your shadow and not just peasants, but even kings will worship you! All this can be yours, but only if you triumph.

This full version contains the following game-play options:
- Over 100 maps for download (free!)
- Over 100 empires to play with
- Scenarios ranging from ancient to modern times
- Fantasy scenarios including zombie nations
- Simple building options
- AI difficulty settings from easy to extreme.
- Management of income and spending
- population and economy management
- Map editor to create custom maps
- Diplomacy: alliances, peace treaties, vassallage

Please try the LITE version if you are not sure if you like the game (also in the Mac App Store). Thanks!
